definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence

sentences.english: The conference covered the following areas, but not limited to the following areas.
sentences.chinese: 這次會議徵稿主要包括以下領域，但不限於以下範圍。

sentences.english: He canvassed the papers, searching for notices inviting contributions to magazines.
sentences.chinese: 他仔細地看了一些報紙，尋找雜誌的徵稿啓事。

sentences.english: International CFP information on database engineering.
sentences.chinese: 數據庫技術相關國際會議徵稿信息。

sentences.english: He canvassed the papers,searching for notices inviting contributions to magazines.
sentences.chinese: 他仔細地看了一些報紙，尋找雜誌的徵稿啓事。

sentences.english: Manuscripts should respect the Guidelines for contributors and mention this call for papers in a covering letter.
sentences.chinese: 原稿需尊重投稿指南並在附函上提及本徵稿啓事。

definition: specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
